name: Movylo Shop
overview:
Movylo Shop is a self service platform to create your mobile store and start selling via mobile.

Movylo Shop lets you create your store, customize it, upload your products and … start selling items via mobile in a few minutes. Movylo Shop will optimize your mobile store for all the different mobile screens, from iPhone to old Nokia.

A merchant gets:

  • a turn key, 100% real time customizable mobile store (m-site + iPhone app + Android app)
  • a complete set of tools to promote and create impulse deals
  • an easy mobile check out

More you will find an intriguing section dedicated to mobile promotions to speed up sales, offers limited in time and availability (“we’re selling the last 10 mp3 readers at 50% off”).

Mobile commerce is not e-commerce seen in a small screen: it’s making important sales exploiting the ubiquitous mobile device you carry in your pocket.

Online merchants start here: www.movyloshop.com

Retailers use Movylo free mobile app: http://www.movyloshop.com/free-deal-creator.php
